channel.title: Making NPCz walk
channel.description:
In the real Rs all most all of the npcs walk around in a certain area. I am working on a reconstruction of Slayer Tower. So i found the npc i wanted (Crawling Hand) to spawn added This [code]spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 0 0 0 0 1 [/code] into the Npc.cfg which looks like this all together [code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2821 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke spawn = 2475 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Frog spawn = 1686 3156 3925 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost Disciple spawn = 520 2611 4777 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1596 3425 3540 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2439 3422 3552 0 0 0 0 0 1
//~~~*Slayer Tower*~~~ spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 0 0 0 0 1 [/code] and the hand stood still so i thought about how to make it move. and i tried this [code] spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 3409 3534 3413 3540 1[/code] Thinking maybe its just like wild/nonwild
but that didnt work so i tried this [code] spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 3409 3540 3413 3534 1[/code] Thinking that it would move from Point A to Point B
But even that didnt work so now i am all out of ideas and asking you, the people at morparscape forums for help... any ideas? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 03, 2008, 05:32:18 pm[/size][hr]i allmost expect rich to come in here type something i dont understand and leave me wondering what the hell it meant so 5mins later i figure out what he said and then kick my self for not knowing how to do this it happens offen [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 03, 2008, 05:56:21 pm[/size][hr]Wow no one knows how to do this god i can only wonder what rich is doing right now...

item.title: Making NPCz walk
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

change the:
Rangex1
Rangex2
Rangey1
Rangey2

Change those to the widest/largest place you want them to walk to.

Read full topic

item.title: Making NPCz walk
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

big numbers then lil numbers.

spawn = 1648	3411	3537	0	3413	3540	3409	3534	1

Like that. NPCID CoordX CoordY HeightLevel LargestXcoord LargestYcoord SmallestXcoord SmallestYcoord Type

Read full topic

item.title: Making NPCz walk
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

In the real Rs all most all of the npcs walk around in a certain area. I am working on a reconstruction of Slayer Tower. So i found the npc i wanted (Crawling Hand) to spawn added This spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 0 0 0 0 1 into the Npc.cfg which looks like this all together [code]//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 2821 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke
spawn = 2475 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 Frog
spawn = 1686 3156 3925 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost Disciple
spawn = 520 2611 4777 0 0 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1596 3425 3540 0 0 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2439 3422 3552 0 0 0 0 0 1

//~Slayer Tower~
spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 0 0 0 0 1
[/code] and the hand stood still so i thought about how to make it move. and i tried this spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 3409 3534 3413 3540 1 Thinking maybe its just like wild/nonwild

but that didnt work so i tried this spawn = 1648 3411 3537 0 3409 3540 3413 3534 1 Thinking that it would move from Point A to Point B

But even that didnt work so now i am all out of ideas and asking you, the people at morparscape forums for help… any ideas?
